channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello World, Hello Hugo.
item.description: The article is intented to demonstrate how is this website boostraped using Hugo. This blog is powered by a open source project named Hugo. Hugo is a static site generator written by Go. The project is well supported with 40.6k star and 4.6k fork as of early 2020. The article will provide insturction all the way from installation, pick a theme to deployment to AWS S3 manually. Install Hugo If you are running macOS, you can install Hugo simplily using brew.
